short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Сheck all links on the page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension adds a new tab (LinksTester) to DevTools.

The extension allows you to check all the links on the page. It collects URLs from all <A> tags and sends a Head request to each address.

As a result, you get statistics with response codes and a list of addresses that return response with a different than 200 code.

Using the extension, you can quickly check all links on your pages are working and your users will not receive error messages.

Capabilities:
• Checking localhost pages.
• Checking dynamic generated pages.
• Checking private pages.

All links are checked from your computer and no information is given to third part. Therefore, your private data is safe.
